column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////For the main course
column2: we went with the house specialty
column3: Chicago Deep Dish Pizza. The Malnati Chicago Classic was made with Lou's lean sausage
column5: and some serious load of cheese. They did not mess around with their cheese
column6: it was awesome! We ordered small but it came in 4 good size slices. We also ordered a small Pepperoni deep dish pizza and between the three of us we couldn't even finish. One of my friends had food coma after we were done.
